about_the_game:
Face the challenge and prove your skill! Beetlemen demands perfect precision with every move, where only the most skilled reach the top. With each attempt, you sharpen your technique and go further. Overcome the obstacles, surpass your limits... And don’t stop until you touch the sky! The leap to victory begins now!

  • Gameplay:

Every time you start the game, the environment is slightly different from the previous one; the platforms will never be the same in two consecutive playthroughs.

This game features mechanics like Dash and double jump, which can be upgraded as you progress.

The goal is to finish in a single run, so there are no saves — only the highest reached height is saved.

This game features mechanics like Dash and double jump, which can be upgraded as you progress.

The goal is to finish in a single run, so there are no saves — only the highest reached height is saved.
name: Beetlemen: JUMP!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GhZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 105 MB available space

short_description: Test your skills! Beetlemen demands perfect precision in every move, where only the most skilled reach the top. With each attempt, you improve your technique and go further. Overcome the obstacles, surpass your own limits... And don’t stop until you touch the sky!
